### Plot PCA results 
Represent all stimuli according to their 2 first dimensions to have an insight about their **dispersions**

```{r message = FALSE, fig.cap = "Polygone area based on PCA two first dimensions"}
filename <- paste(path1,"evals_su=S01-BCS_stim=face_PCA.csv",sep = "")
pca <- read_csv(filename, show_col_types = FALSE)

X <- pca[5:6]
hpts <- chull(X)
hpts <- c(hpts, hpts[1])
{plot(X, cex = 0.5)
pts <- X[hpts,]
chull.poly <- Polygon(pts, hole=T)
chull.area <- chull.poly@area
lines(pts)}
```

```{r ECHO = FALSE}
print(paste("polygone surface >> ",chull.area))
```
